channel.title: Comments on: Life after the bubble – Sunday Tribune – Damien Mulley

item.title: By: Paul M. Watson
item.dc:creator: Paul M. Watson
item.description: Well said. Working in the TSSG I see a lot of EI funding. It pays for my project but there are other ideas out there that are good but can't get the funding due to bureaucracy.
item.content:encoded: Well said. Working in the TSSG I see a lot of EI funding. It pays for my project but there are other ideas out there that are good but can’t get the funding due to bureaucracy.
